author: ben
msg: Get rid of another (int)NULL - this time it should be '\0'.

author: ben
msg: Clean source to -w3 on SCO 5 (optional modules not included yet).

author: ben
msg: Correct potential buffer overrun when constructing a temp file name. This fix
admittedly may waste a few bytes of pool in exchange for simpler code.

author: ben
msg: (int) NULL is a most disgusting construct, and wrong anyway - to invalidate a
file descriptor you should use -1, not 0.
